PreSQL.SQLText: SELECT route.* FROM user_route, cent_user, route WHERE user_route.userid = cent_user.userid AND cent_user.usernm = USER AND route.operator_id = user_route.operator_id UNION SELECT route.* FROM user_route, cent_user, route WHERE user_route.userid = cent_user.userid AND cent_user.usernm = USER AND route.route_id = user_route.route_id UNION SELECT route.* FROM route, cent_user WHERE 1 = 1 AND 1 = 1 AND ( route.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER AND cent_user.userid NOT IN ( SELECT userid FROM user_route ) INTO TEMP t_route WITH NO LOG;
CREATE INDEX i_t_route ON t_route ( route_id );

Assignment.Expression: 'Tooltips=Vehicle Code;Lateness Band;Route,Type=Icon,HotspotX=32,HotspotY=42,KeyField=Key,Filters=Route;Vehicle Code;Lateness Band;Trip Type;Trip Status,RenderType=Despatcher,RenderElements=Operator Code;Route;Vehicle Code;Trip Type;Trip Status;Lateness,Metric=Lateness,PosColor=#ff0000,Negcolor=#0000ff,ZeroColor=#00ff00,MetricRangeLower=-300,MetricRangeUpper=300'

Query.WhereSql: AND operator.operator_id IN ( SELECT route_for_user.operator_id FROM route_for_user )
AND 1 = 1 AND publish_tt.service_id = service.service_id AND service.route_id = route.route_id
AND 1 = 1 AND 1 = 1 AND ( vehicle.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER
